name: The Necromancer of North Oaks
text: Deep within the oak forest lies an ancient source of evil.
aftera: If the necromancer was killed, give one of the characters who helped kill the necromancer the tag deathtouched. Unlock the Deathtouched asset card and add it to their character deck.

name: Doom Under Sightrock
text: A grim and hopeless despair permeates the lush fields and streams in the shadow of Sightrock.

name: The Sunriders
text: The people of the steppes are a powerful ally in the fight against the Empire.
aftera: If Ile is still in play, make a character shaken and then increase their motivation by one.
rewardc: xxSQUARE Unlock Spirit Lake spotlight location

name: Gravewood
text: Fiercely independent and secretive, the woodsfolk are sparing with their trust.
rewardc: xxSQUARE Unlock Isle of Apples spotlight location

name: Into the Cold
text: Eastkeep is the safest entry point to the Empire.
rewardc: xxSQUARE Unlock Map Hall spotlight location

name: Ballad of Eight Ears
text: The cursed hermit known as Eight Ears guards the dark hollows of Gray Forest.

name: Burgan Vale
text: The people of Burgan Vale treat the Veil - the energies which bind the land the people together - as the centerpiece for every aspect of life.
rewardc: xxSQUARE Unlock Arankh Tower spotlight location

name: Sowing Rebellion
text: The breadbasket of the Empire, the people of Guilder Farms are not content.

name: Tragedy and Conspiracy
text: Imperials have fanned the flames of conspiracy against Red Bank in the wake of a terrible tragedy.

name: Whispers at Lily Manor
text: A gathering of cultures, Imperials work to spread distrust against Red Bank.

name: Animaelic Forest
text: If discord overflows in the animaelic forest, a character in the group is killed, lost in the maelstrom. If a character is knocked out, they are removed from play.
